org.phantomapi.ppa

Class PPAEndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.ppa.PPAEndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public abstract class PPAEndPoint
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Represents a ppa endpoint which can receive packets and send back responses (and receive those responses). Essentially, you should implement this on both servers communicating to handle responses.
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPAEndPoint(String type)
      Create an endpoint listening on a type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this end point
      void on(PPAReceiveEvent e) 
      abstract PPA onReceived(PPA packet)
      Called when the end point receives a packet with your type expecting you to send back a response using .createResponse().
      abstract void onResponded(PPA packet)
      Called when the end point has received a response back from the packet this server previously sent.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPAEndPoint

        public PPAEndPoint(String type)
        Create an endpoint listening on a type. This will also listen on your type + "-response" for .createResponse() packets.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the packet to listen on

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Close this end point

      • on

        public void on(PPAReceiveEvent e)

      • onReceived

        public abstract PPA onReceived(PPA packet)
        Called when the end point receives a packet with your type expecting you to send back a response using .createResponse().
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet received
        Returns:
        the packet to respond back to the sender

      • onResponded

        public abstract void onResponded(PPA packet)
        Called when the end point has received a response back from the packet this server previously sent. If you implemented your endpoint on the responding server, you should expect to receive your response packet here
        Parameters:
        packet - the response packet
